title: Molecular Modeling of Elasticity.
body: In this project  the aim is to understand quantitatively the molecular elasticity of biopolymers with potential engineering applications.
research_area: Statistical Themodynamics | Polymer Physics | Molecular Simulations | Biomolecular Engineering

title: Supercritical Fluid-based Nanoparticle Production.
body: A supercritical fluid (SCF) is a substance at temperature and pressure above its critical temperature and critical pressure.
